description: Drug-specific information related to a pharmacogenomic variant.

columns.name: VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the variant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PGX_MED_CODESET_C_NAME
columns.description:
The medication coding system category for the pharmacogenomic variant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


RxT-Ingrd


ATC

columns.name: PGX_MED_CODE
columns.description: Code for the medication being assessed for usage suggestions based on drug-gene interactions.

columns.name: ASSOC_MED_NAME
columns.description: Name of the medication being assessed for usage suggestions based on drug-gene interactions.

columns.name: MED_USE_CATEGORY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The medication usage suggestion category for the pharmacogenomic variant.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Consider alternative medication


Decrease dose


Increase dose


Use caution


Normal response expected
